00001 /**********************************************************doxygen*//** @file
00002  * @brief   Balanced traveling salesman problem iterative bottleneck
00003  *          algorithm.
00004  *
00005  * Heuristic for solving the balanced traveling salesman problem iterative
00006  * bottleneck algorithm (BalTSP IB-Algorithm).
00007  *
00008  * @author  John LaRusic
00009  * @ingroup lib
00010  ****************************************************************************/

00020  *  @brief  Calculates the best BTSP lower bound
00021  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00022  *  @param  lower_bound [out] the best lower bound value
00023  */
00024 int

00027 /**
00028  *  @brief  Calculates BTSP lower bounds for each unique cost
00029  *  @param  problem [in] problem structure
00030  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00031  *  @param  max_index [in/out] largest index to bother searching (can change if
00032  *              lower bounds infeasible for some value)
00033  *  @param  btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
00034  *  @param  best_gap [out] smallest gap bound calculated
00035  *  @param  best_low [out] lower cost value for the best gap bound
00036  *  @param  best_high [out] upper cost value for the best gap bound
00037  *  @param  total_time [out] total time spent calculating lower bound values
00038  */
00039 int
00040 btsp_bounds(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, int *max_index, 
00041             int *btsp_lbs, int *best_gap, int *best_low, int *best_high, 
00042             double *total_time);
00043 
00044 /**
00045  *  @brief  Calculates a sorted tree of unique BalTSP lower bounds
00046  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00047  *  @param  btsp_lbs [out] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
00048  *  @param  max_index [in] largest index to bother searching
00049  *  @param  tree [out] sorted tree of unique BalTSP lower bounds
00050  */
00051 int
00052 baltsp_bounds_tree(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00053                    arrow_bintree *tree);

00065 int

00067            int *baltsp_lb, int num_baltsp_lbs, arrow_llist *tiers);

00069 /**

00074 int

00082 void

00085 /**
00086  *  @brief  Fills cost_order with a good order for processing them with the 
00087  *          IB-algorithm.
00088  *  @param  info [in] problem info
00089  *  @param  max_index [in] largest index to bother searching
00090  *  @param  btsp_lbs [in] array of BTSP bounds for each cost
00091  *  @param  cost_order [out] specifically ordered array of costs
00092  */
00093 int

00096 /****************************************************************************
00097  * Public function implementations
00098  ****************************************************************************/
00099 int 
00100 arrow_balanced_tsp_lb(arrow_problem *problem, 
00101                       arrow_problem_info *info,
00102                       int btsp_min_cost, int btsp_max_cost, 
00103                       int mstsp_min_cost,
00104                       int *lb_result)
00105 {
00106     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00107     int low, high;
00108     int low_val, max;
00109     int btsp_lb;
00110     arrow_btsp_fun fun_ib;
00111     arrow_problem *solve_problem;
00112     arrow_problem ib_problem;
00113         
00114     /* For future use, possibly, to handle asymmetric instances */
00115     solve_problem = problem;
00116     
00117     /* Setup result structures */
00118     *lb_result = INT_MAX;
00119     
00120     /* Find low/high/max values */
00121     low = 0;
00122     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, btsp_min_cost, &low))
00123     {
00124         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00125         arrow_debug(" - Using low = 0\n");
00126         low = 0;
00127     }
00128     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, btsp_max_cost, &high))
00129     {
00130         arrow_debug("Could not find btsp_max_cost in cost_list\n");
00131         arrow_debug(" - Using high = 0\n");
00132         high = 0;
00133     }
00134     *lb_result = btsp_max_cost - btsp_min_cost;
00135     
00136     if(mstsp_min_cost == INT_MAX)
00137         mstsp_min_cost = info->max_cost;
00138     if(!arrow_problem_info_cost_index(info, mstsp_min_cost, &max))
00139     {
00140         arrow_debug("Could not find mstsp_min_cost in cost_list\n");
00141         arrow_debug(" - Using max_cost = %d\n", info->max_cost);
00142         max = info->cost_list_length - 1;
00143     }
00144     
00145     low++;
00146     printf("low = %d; high = %d; max = %d\n", low, high, max);
00147     
00148     
00149     /* Create function for ignoring C[i,j] < low_val */
00150     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_ib(ARROW_TRUE, &fun_ib))
00151     {
00152         arrow_print_error("Could not create IB transformation function\n");
00153         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00154         goto CLEANUP;
00155     }
00156     
00157     arrow_debug("Starting iterative bottleneck search\n");
00158     
00159     /* Main loop */
00160     arrow_debug("Starting balanced search [%d,...]\n", info->cost_list[low]);
00161     while((low <= max) && (high < info->cost_list_length))
00162     {        
00163         printf("------------------------------------\n");
00164         low_val = info->cost_list[low];
00165         printf("C[i,j] >= %d: \n", low_val);
00166         
00167         /* Create problem that ignores C[i,j] < low_val */
00168         if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_ib, solve_problem, low_val, info->max_cost, &ib_problem))
00169         {
00170             arrow_print_error("Could not create IB cost matrix\n");
00171             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00172             goto CLEANUP;
00173         }
00174         
00175         /* See if the BTSP lower bound is less than the current gap */
00176         if(!btsp_lower_bound(&ib_problem, info, &btsp_lb))
00177         {
00178             arrow_print_error("Could not solve BTSP lower bounds on IB cost matrix\n");
00179             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00180             goto CLEANUP;
00181         }
00182         
00183         if(btsp_lb > info->max_cost)
00184         {
00185             arrow_debug("End of the line!\n");
00186             low = max + 1;
00187         }
00188         else
00189         {    
00190             arrow_debug("best_lb - low_val = %d - %d = %d vs best_gap = %d",
00191                         btsp_lb, low_val, btsp_lb - low_val, *lb_result);
00192         
00193             if(btsp_lb - low_val < *lb_result)
00194             {
00195                 *lb_result = btsp_lb - low_val;
00196                 arrow_debug(" Improved!");            
00197             }
00198             arrow_debug("\n");
00199             low++;        
00200         }
00201         arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00202     }
00203     arrow_debug("\n");
00204 
00205 CLEANUP:
00206     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_ib);
00207     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00208 }
00209 
00210 
00211 /****************************************************************************
00212  * Private function implementations
00213  ****************************************************************************/
00214 int 
00215 btsp_lower_bound(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, 
00216                  int *lower_bound)
00217 {
00218     arrow_bound_result result;
00219     
00220     if(!arrow_bbssp_solve(problem, info, &result))
00221     {
00222         arrow_debug("Error finding BBSSP lower bound\n");
00223         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00224     }
00225     if(result.obj_value == -1)
00226         *lower_bound = info->max_cost + 1;
00227     else
00228         *lower_bound = result.obj_value;
00229     
00230     if(!arrow_bap_solve(problem, info, &result))
00231     {
00232         arrow_debug("Error finding BAP lower bound\n");
00233         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00234     }
00235     if(result.obj_value == -1)
00236         *lower_bound = info->max_cost + 1;
00237     else if(result.obj_value > *lower_bound)
00238         *lower_bound = result.obj_value;
00239         
00240     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00241 }
00242 
00243 int
00244 btsp_bounds(arrow_problem *problem, arrow_problem_info *info, int *max_index, 
00245             int *btsp_lbs, int *best_gap, int *best_low, int *best_high, 
00246             double *total_time)
00247 {
00248     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00249     int i;
00250     int cost;
00251     int lb;
00252     int gap;
00253     double start_time;
00254     double end_time;
00255     arrow_btsp_fun fun_ib;
00256     arrow_problem ib_problem;
00257     
00258     /* Create function for ignoring C[i,j] < low_val */
00259     if(!arrow_baltsp_fun_ib(ARROW_TRUE, &fun_ib))
00260     {
00261         arrow_print_error("Could not create IB transformation function\n");
00262         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00263         goto CLEANUP;
00264     }
00265     
00266     *best_gap = INT_MAX;
00267     *total_time = 0.0;
00268     
00269     for(i = 0; i <= *max_index; i++)
00270     {
00271         cost = info->cost_list[i];
00272         
00273         /* Create problem that ignores C[i,j] < low_val */
00274         if(!arrow_btsp_fun_apply(&fun_ib, problem, cost, info->max_cost, &ib_problem))
00275         {
00276             arrow_print_error("Could not create IB cost matrix\n");
00277             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00278             goto CLEANUP;
00279         }
00280         
00281         /* Calculate lower bound */
00282         start_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00283         if(!btsp_lower_bound(&ib_problem, info, &lb))
00284         {
00285             arrow_print_error("Error finding BTSP lower bound\n");
00286             ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00287             goto CLEANUP;
00288         }
00289         end_time = arrow_util_zeit();
00290         *total_time += (end_time - start_time);
00291         
00292         /* A negative value indicates an infeasible lower bound, so we quit here */
00293         if(lb < 0)
00294         {
00295             arrow_debug("Negative value for the lower bound #%d, so quit\n", i);
00296             arrow_debug("Old Max Index Value: %d\n", *max_index);
00297             *max_index = i - 1;
00298             arrow_debug("New Max Index Value: %d\n", *max_index);
00299             break;
00300         }
00301         
00302         /* Store calculated value for later, update best lower bound */
00303         gap = lb - cost;
00304         btsp_lbs[i] = lb;    
00305         if(gap < *best_gap)
00306         {
00307             *best_low = cost;
00308             *best_high = lb;
00309             *best_gap = gap;
00310         }
00311         
00312         /* Destroy problem */
00313         arrow_problem_destruct(&ib_problem);
00314     }
00315     arrow_debug("\n");
00316 
00317 CLEANUP:
00318     arrow_btsp_fun_destruct(&fun_ib);
00319     return ret;
00320 }
00321 
00322 int
00323 baltsp_bounds_tree(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00324                    arrow_bintree *tree)
00325 {
00326     int i;
00327     
00328     /* Sort the unique gap values */
00329     arrow_bintree_init(tree);        
00330     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00331     {    
00332         if(!arrow_bintree_insert(tree, btsp_lbs[i] - info->cost_list[i]))
00333         {
00334             arrow_print_error("Could not sort BalTSP lower bounds");
00335             arrow_bintree_destruct(tree);
00336             return ARROW_FAILURE;
00337         }
00338     }
00339     
00340     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00341 }
00342 
00343 int
00344 fill_tiers(arrow_problem_info *info, int *btsp_lbs, int max_index, 
00345            int *baltsp_lb, int num_baltsp_lbs, arrow_llist *tiers)
00346 {
00347     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00348     int i;
00349     int cost;
00350     int gap;
00351     int idx;
00352     arrow_hash hash;
00353     arrow_llist *list;
00354     
00355     /* Create a hash of the unique values */
00356     if(!arrow_hash_cost_list(baltsp_lb, num_baltsp_lbs, &hash))
00357     {
00358         arrow_print_error("Could not create hash of unique BalTSP bounds");
00359         goto CLEANUP;
00360     }
00361     
00362     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00363     {
00364         cost = info->cost_list[i];
00365         gap = btsp_lbs[i] - cost;
00366         idx = arrow_hash_search(&hash, gap);
00367         
00368         list = &(tiers[idx]);
00369         arrow_llist_insert_tail(list, i);
00370     }
00371 
00372 CLEANUP:
00373     arrow_hash_destruct(&hash);
00374     return ret;
00375 }
00376 
00377 int
00378 init_tiers(int num_tiers, arrow_llist **tiers)
00379 {
00380     int i;
00381     arrow_llist *tier;
00382     
00383     /* Allocate memory */
00384     if((*tiers = malloc(num_tiers * sizeof(arrow_llist))) == NULL)
00385     {
00386         arrow_print_error("Error allocating memory for array of linked lists.");
00387         *tiers = NULL;
00388         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00389     }
00390     
00391     /* Initialize lists */
00392     for(i = 0; i < num_tiers; i++)
00393     {
00394         tier = &((*tiers)[i]);
00395         arrow_llist_init(tier);
00396     }
00397     
00398     return ARROW_SUCCESS;
00399 }
00400 
00401 void
00402 destruct_tiers(int num_tiers, arrow_llist **tiers)
00403 {
00404     int i;
00405     arrow_llist *tier;
00406     
00407     if(*tiers != NULL)
00408     {
00409         for(i = 0; i < num_tiers; i++)
00410         {
00411             tier = &((*tiers)[i]);
00412             arrow_llist_destruct(tier);
00413         }
00414         free(*tiers);
00415     }
00416 }
00417 
00418 int
00419 find_cost_order(arrow_problem_info *info, int max_index, int *btsp_lbs, int *cost_order)
00420 {
00421     int ret = ARROW_SUCCESS;
00422     int i, k;
00423     int idx;
00424     int *baltsp_lbs;
00425     int num_tiers;
00426     arrow_llist *tier;
00427     arrow_llist *tiers;
00428     arrow_bintree tree;
00429         
00430     /* Find a list of unique BalTSP lower bounds */
00431     if(!baltsp_bounds_tree(info, btsp_lbs, max_index, &tree))
00432     {
00433         arrow_print_error("Could not create BalTSP bounds list");
00434         return ARROW_FAILURE;
00435     }
00436     
00437     /* Create array for holding Balanced TSP lower bounds */
00438     if(!arrow_util_create_int_array(tree.size, &baltsp_lbs))
00439     {
00440         arrow_print_error("Could not create baltsp_lbs array\n");
00441         baltsp_lbs = NULL;
00442         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00443         goto CLEANUP;
00444     }
00445     
00446     /* Convert tree to an array */
00447     arrow_bintree_to_array(&tree, baltsp_lbs);
00448     num_tiers = tree.size;
00449     
00450     /* Create and fill the list of tiers with costs corresponding to each 
00451        BalTSP lower bound */
00452     if(!init_tiers(num_tiers, &tiers))
00453     {
00454         arrow_print_error("Could not create tiers of linked lists");
00455         tiers = NULL;
00456         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00457         goto CLEANUP;
00458     }
00459     if(!fill_tiers(info, btsp_lbs, max_index, baltsp_lbs, num_tiers, tiers))
00460     {
00461         arrow_print_error("Could not fill tiers of linked lists");
00462         ret = ARROW_FAILURE;
00463         goto CLEANUP;
00464     }
00465     
00466     /* Fill cost_order according to order in tiers */
00467     i = 0;
00468     for(k = 0; k < num_tiers; k++)
00469     {
00470         tier = &(tiers[k]);
00471         while(tier->size > 0)
00472         {
00473             arrow_llist_remove_head(tier, &idx);
00474             cost_order[i] = idx;
00475             i++;
00476         }
00477     }
00478 
00479     /*
00480     arrow_debug("Cost index order: ");
00481     for(i = 0; i <= max_index; i++)
00482         arrow_debug("%d, ", cost_order[i]);
00483     arrow_debug("EOL\n\n");
00484     */
00485          
00486 CLEANUP:
00487     free(baltsp_lbs);
00488     destruct_tiers(num_tiers, &tiers);
00489     arrow_bintree_destruct(&tree);
00490     return ret;
00491 }
